nodes.text: Classic Star Wars: A New Hope (book-and-tape)
Classic Star Wars: A New Hope is a 24-page book and audio cassette tape adaptation of Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope, released in November 1994.

The action-packed adventure begins when young Luke Skywalker is swept away from his quiet home into battle among the stars! With the help of beautiful Princess Leia, the smuggler Han Solo and the mysterious Obi-Wan Kenobi, Luke comes face-to-face with the awesome Death Star in this explosive Star Wars Adventure.
